meanings.definition: The overall sound environment in a particular location.
meanings.sent1: The soundscape of the forest was filled with chirping birds and rustling leaves.
meanings.sent2: The soundscape of the city included honking cars and bustling crowds.
meanings.sent3: The soundscape of the library suddenly turned chaotic when someone's phone rang loudly.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the soundscape of the beach transformed into a symphony of crashing waves.
meanings.sent5: The soundscape of the concert hall enveloped the audience in a rich tapestry of music.

meanings.definition: A recording or representation of the sounds in a particular environment.
meanings.sent1: She listened to the soundscape of the rainforest to relax and unwind.
meanings.sent2: The documentary used a soundscape of the bustling city to set the scene.
meanings.sent3: The soundscape of the jungle in the movie made the audience feel like they were there.
meanings.sent4: The artist created a soundscape of the ocean using only natural sounds.
meanings.sent5: The soundscape of the spaceship in the sci-fi movie was created using futuristic technology.
